original_text: God cut you like branches from a wild olive tree. Then he put you into the farmer's olive tree so that you became part of it. He could do that even though that was not your own tree before. So God will be able to do that for Israel's people. He can easily put them back into their own tree, that they were part of before. 11: When Jesus lived on earth, most of Israel's people, the Jews, did not believe that Jesus was God's Messiah. They were no longer part of God's true people. God's true people were like an olive tree that God had planted long ago. The wild olive tree is like the Gentiles. If they believe in Jesus, they become part of God's people. If the Jews decide to believe in Jesus, then they also belong to God's people again. God will save the Jews God cut you like branches from a wild olive tree. Then he put you into the farmer's olive tree so that you became part of it. He could do that even though that was not your own tree before. So God will be able to do that for Israel's people. He can easily put them back into their own tree, that they were part of before.
korean_text: 네가 원 돌감람나무에서 찍힘을 받고 본성을 거슬러 좋은 감람나무에 접붙임을 받았으니 원 가지인 이 사람들이야 얼마나 더 자기 감람나무에 접붙이심을 받으랴

sentences.original_text: God cut you like branches from a wild olive tree.
sentences.korean_translation: 하나님은 들감나무에서 가지를 자르듯 너희를 잘라내셨다.

sentences.original_text: Then he put you into the farmer's olive tree
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그분은 너희를 농부의 감람나무에 심으셨다.

sentences.original_text: so that you became part of it.
He could do that even though that was not your own tree before.
sentences.korean_translation: 그것이 전에는 너희의 나무가 아니었음에도 불구하고 그분은 그렇게 하실 수 있었다.

sentences.original_text: So God will be able to do that for Israel's people.
sentences.korean_translation: 그러므로 하나님은 이스라엘 백성을 위해서도 그렇게 하실 수 있을 것이다.

sentences.original_text: He can easily put them back into their own tree
sentences.korean_translation: 그분은 그들을 쉽게 그들의 자신의 나무로 돌려놓을 수 있다.

sentences.original_text: that they were part of before.
most of Israel's people, the Jews,
did not believe that Jesus was God's Messiah.
sentences.korean_translation: 예수님이 하나님의 메시아라는 것을 믿지 않았다.

sentences.original_text: They were no longer part of God's true people.
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 더 이상 하나님의 참백성의 일부가 아니었다.

sentences.original_text: God's true people were like an olive tree
that God had planted long ago.
The wild olive tree is like the Gentiles.
they become part of God's people.
If the Jews decide to believe in Jesus,
then they also belong to God's people again.
sentences.korean_translation: 그들 역시 다시 하나님의 백성에 속하게 된다.
